characterDescription.skinTone: Light skin with slightly warm undertones, a hint of rosiness in the cheeks and around the nose. Skin appears fair but not porcelain, with a natural healthy glow.
characterDescription.eyeColor: Bright, clear blue eyes with a slight darker blue limbal ring. The irises have subtle darker speckles that are more visible closer to the pupil.
characterDescription.eyeShape: Almond-shaped eyes, slightly downturned at the outer corners giving a thoughtful expression. Moderate sized eyes relative to the face.
characterDescription.hairColor: Medium brown hair with noticeable warm chestnut tones, particularly visible in direct light. There are subtle natural highlights that make some strands appear lighter brown.
characterDescription.hairTexture: Slightly wavy hair with a medium density. The hair seems soft and manageable, with a tendency to frizz slightly at the ends, especially around the face.
characterDescription.hairStyle: Hair varies in photos: sometimes long, loosely styled, and other times styled into high pigtails, creating two small buns on top of the head. Fringes and wisps of hair around the hairline give it a slightly undone look.
characterDescription.faceShape: Oval face with a slightly rounded forehead and a gently tapering jawline. Cheeks are full and contribute to a youthful appearance.
characterDescription.nose: Small to medium-sized nose with a slightly rounded tip. The bridge is straight and the nostrils are proportionate to the overall size of the nose.
characterDescription.lips: Medium-sized lips with a well-defined Cupid's bow on the upper lip. The lips have a natural pink hue, slightly deeper on the lower lip. The bottom lip is fuller than the top lip.
characterDescription.smile: Wide, expressive smile revealing upper teeth and a visible gap between the two front teeth. Her smile brightens her entire face and gives her a cheerful appearance.
characterDescription.eyebrows: Medium-thickness eyebrows with a slightly arched shape. The color is slightly darker than the hair, giving a subtle contrast. They are well-groomed but retain a natural appearance.
characterDescription.ears: Ears are medium-sized and appear to lie relatively close to the head. The earlobes are attached.
characterDescription.cheeks: Full cheeks with subtle rosiness, especially prominent when smiling. No visible dimples.
characterDescription.chin: Rounded chin with a smooth contour. The chin is proportionate to the rest of the face.
characterDescription.facialProportions: Balanced facial proportions with eyes, nose and mouth in harmonious relation to each other. The forehead is a good size in proportion to the rest of her face. Her features are very age appropriate.
characterDescription.distinctiveFeatures: A noticeable gap between the front two upper teeth is a distinguishing feature. She also has slight natural shadows under her eyes. Her ears appear to be attached.
characterDescription.overallImpression: A bright and cheerful child with a friendly, open face. Her expressive eyes and toothy grin give her an engaging presence. She has a sweet and innocent appearance typical of her age.
characterDescription.fullDescription: This 7-8 year old girl has a light complexion with subtly warm undertones and naturally rosy cheeks. She has striking clear blue, almond-shaped eyes. Her medium brown hair, often styled in pigtails, has warm chestnut tones and a slight wave. She has an oval face with full cheeks, a small to medium nose with a rounded tip, and a mouth with a well-defined cupid's bow. Her most distinctive feature is the noticeable gap between her front two upper teeth which is revealed by her joyful, wide smile.
